name: Cucumber Salad
shortDescription: Refreshing cucumber salad with tangy dressing.
longDescription: Crisp cucumbers, juicy tomatoes, and zesty onions tossed in a light vinaigrette dressing, perfect for a refreshing and healthy side dish.

name: Veg Sandwich
shortDescription: Hearty veg sandwich with savory spreads.
longDescription: Colorful vegetables layered between soft bread slices, enhanced with savory spreads, offering a satisfying meal or a delightful snack.

name: Vegetable Pizza
shortDescription: Classic pizza with fresh veggies and cheese.
longDescription: Crispy crust topped with tangy tomato sauce, fresh vegetables, and melted cheese, delivering a burst of flavor in every bite, a favorite for pizza lovers.

name: French Fries
longDescription: Golden fries, crispy outside and fluffy inside, seasoned to perfection for a satisfying snack or a delicious side to any meal.

name: Pasta
longDescription: Al dente noodles coated in a rich and flavorful sauce, complemented with fresh vegetables and aromatic herbs, offering a cozy and delightful dining experience.
